verses.name: Acts 26:23
verses.text: That Christ should suffer, and that he should be the first that should rise from the dead, and should shew light unto the people, and to the Gentiles.

verses.name: Acts 26:24
verses.text: And as he thus spake for himself, Festus said with a loud voice, Paul, thou art beside thyself; much learning doth make thee mad.

verses.name: Acts 26:25
verses.text: But he said, I am not mad, most noble Festus; but speak forth the words of truth and soberness.
